# Accounting & Audit â€“ Audit Controls

## Control Requirements
- All accounting entries must be traceable to originating events.
- Changes must be logged with before-and-after visibility.
- User or system actions affecting records must be identifiable.

## Audit Expectations
- Complete lineage from source event to final report
- Ability to reconstruct historical financial states
- Clear separation between data creation and audit review

## Forbidden
- Deletion of accounting records
- Modification without audit trail
- Unattributed or anonymous changes
